Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/72nd
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 71st and Ashland, due to, street blockage, near Ashland/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 71st and Ashland, due to, street blockage, near Ashland/72nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at California.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at California. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
